All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Course
Represents a course
CourseRepository
CourseRepository extends the InFileRepo, the class stores and updates instances of class type Course
CourseRepositoryTest
Tests the methods from the CourseRepository class
ICrudRepository<E>
CRUD operations repository interface
InFileRepo<T>
 
InMemoryRepository<T>
 
InputMismatchException
the InputMismatchException is an exception class the class is used when a wrong input type was introduced
InvalidInputException
the InvalidInputException is an exception class the class is used when an invalid value was introduced
Main
 
Person
Represents a Person
RegistrationSystemController
the RegistrationSystemController class implements 2 sort methods 2 filter methods a register method that registers a student to a course a retrieveCoursesWithFreePlaces method that searches for courses with available places a deleteCourseByTeacher method that delete a course
RegistrationSystemControllerTest
Tests the methods from the RegistrationSystemController class
Student
Represents a Student,who is also a person so the class inherits from the Person class
StudentRepository
StudentRepository extends the InFileRepo, the class stores and updates instances of class type Student
StudentRepositoryTest
Tests the methods from the StudentRepository class
Teacher
Represent a Teacher, who is also a person so the class inherits from the class Person
TeacherRepository
TeacherRepository extends the InFileRepo, the class stores and updates instances of class type Teacher
TeacherRepositoryTest
Tests the methods from the TeacherRepository class
View
View represents the layer that interacts with the costumer, the class uses the RegistrationSystemController class
